1370: Pietersen was born in Bloemendaelse straet in 1370.
Got married to Eggerdus at age 16 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Jacob in 1371 at age 17.
1373: Gave birth to Albertus in 1373 at age 19.
1374: Gave birth to Haghen in 1374 at age 20.
1376: Gave birth to Liudburgis in 1376 at age 22.
Lost son Jacob when Jacob was 6 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Geile in 1378 at age 24.
1381: Gave birth to Helpriko in 1381 at age 27.
1385: Gave birth to Pietersen in 1385 at age 31.
1386: Gave birth to Aghete in 1386 at age 32.
1388: Gave birth to Nannen in 1388 at age 34.
1389: Gave birth to Hadewigis in 1389 at age 35.
